statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 2 , 4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 1 , -30 \, x^{3} - 30 \, x^{2} + 36 \, x + 12 , -11 \, x^{3} - 12 \, x^{2} + 23 \, x + 5 , -32 \, x^{3} - 34 \, x^{2} + 58 \, x + 14\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
